title: Ticket #655: list required attributes for job hooks
description: Ian Chesal requests, "I think the Hooks document section needs to do its own "these are the attributes you need" section as there seem to be Hook-specific ads required that COD jobs don't have to worry about."
remarks:
2010-Feb-04 12:06:12 by smoler:
This has been checked by Dan, and the required attributes really are the same ones as for COD jobs. No changes need be made.

The entire 4.4 Job Hooks section has now been edited and corrected. Subsection 4.4.1.4 with a selecting the java jvm at the execute machine example contained both errors and omissions which have been (hopefully) fixed.
creator: smoler
